scripts.prisma-pull-generate: cd schemas && ls | while read -r schema; do (cd $schema && bunx prisma db pull); done && pnpm prisma-generate
scripts.prisma-generate: cd schemas && ls | while read -r schema; do (cd $schema && bunx prisma generate); done && rm -rf dist
scripts.prisma-resolve: cd schemas && ls | while read -r schema; do (cd $schema && bunx prisma migrate resolve --applied 0_init); done
scripts.prisma-migrate: cd schemas && ls | while read -r schema; do (cd $schema && bunx prisma migrate deploy); done
scripts.dev: docker compose -f docker-compose-dev.yml up --force-recreate -d && bash wait-until-db-ready.bash
